title: 200 Range
body:
Noone  has mentioned Irelia  having 200 AA range on a Mobile fighter.
 
Juggernauts were set apart from other fighters by having  Increased Auto attack Range. 

Since most didn't scale well with Attack speed. 
But. Fuck them right  
 just give a Mobile Diver with hard CC and an Atkspeed ramp. Better Melee range than the whole Group that sacrifices Mobility for that little extra Range.    
It's shit like this is that is killing your loyal playerbase.

It's No wonder people are leaving this Game you stomp all over your old designs and the only  people who see it have been here long enough to notice.

Edit. My point is Riot is adding more power creep to the game by ignoring previous design philosophies they created.

Which now makes the Irelia range seem so unfair and like it's coming from an aspect of juggernauts, when there was really no justification for the champions that comprised the juggernaut class to get it by being categorized as juggernauts.

We'll see if it's actually an issue or not soon. Highly speculate her range is gonna go down to 175, otherwise I can see in the near future we're gonna start having range creep on melee champions.
